title: Eureka J15 Pro Ultra Robot Vacuum and Mop with Self Emptying Base, 16,200 Pa Suction, Flex-Arm Design Mop, Auto Mop Hot Water Washing & Hot Air Drying, Anti-Tangle, AI Obstacle Avoidance, Black
description: We know you value a clean home and Eureka is proud to offer whole home cleaning solutions to make life a little easier.

【UP TO 75 DAYS OF HANDS-FREE MAINTANENCE】: 8-in-1 Functional Base automatically empties debris along with automatically refilling water and hot water mop washing and drying. J15 Pro Ultra's mop pads are washed with 75°C(167°F) hot clean water, then dried with 55°C (131°F) heated air reducing mold & mildew. With battery charging and dock self-cleaning, enjoy hassle-free cleaning.

【UNBEATABLE VACUUM POWER REMOVES 99% DEBRIS】: Experience Powerful 16,200 Pa suction for a deeper clean across all floor types. Eureka J15 Pro Ultra robot vacuum's advanced aluminum fan boosts motor performance and heat dissipation is perfect for deep cleaning carpets and hard-to-reach crevices

【CLEAN EDGE TO EDGE WITH ADVANCED FLEX-ARM DESIGN】: J15’s Rounded-Square Body and Flex-arm Design extends cleaning to reach all tight spots and corners, vacuuming and mopping closer to the edge eliminating stuck on stains and hidden dirt. Covering floors less than 1.36mm along the edge for precision cleaning.

【SAY GOODBYE TO TANGLED HAIR WITH FLEXIRAZOR ANTI-HAIR TANGLING TECHNOLOGY】: J15’s advanced brushroll technology actively cuts hair, operating at 400 cuts per minute, reducing hair from wrapping by 99%. Keep your robot running at peak performance without the hassle of hair wrapping.

【DETECTS AND CLEANS HIDDEN DIRT AND STUCK ON MESSES】: J15’s Intelligent Dirt Detection can accurately detect dry and wet messes. When encountering wet messes, the vacuum will rotate its body to prioritize cleaning with the mop. And When the robot vacuum encounters dry debris, it automatically reduces the side brush speed to minimizing mess spread and deep cleaning all debris.

【INTELLIVIEW AI-POWERED OBSTACLE AVOIDANCE + LiDAR NAVIGATION】: IntelliView™ Al-Powered Obstacle Avoidance combines High-precision cameras combine with LiDAR navigation, to recognize 150+ object types such as shoes, pet waste, toys, and navigate around ensuring an uninterrupted clean. Adding in automatic LED headlights to illuminate low-light environments, flexible scheduling, and 3D environmental perception ensures reliable and trustworthy automatic cleaning.
If you have any questions,contact our customer service team at 1-800-282-2886
